data.title: Prime Minister Kurti met the former Prime Minister of Greece, George Papandreou – Zyra e Kryeministrit
data.text:
Athens, 24 October, 2023

During his stay in Greece, in the Greek capital, the Prime Minister of the Republic of Kosovo, Albin Kurti, met with the former Prime Minister of Greece, at the same time the honorary president of the Socialist International, George Papandreou.

With Mr. Papandreou, Prime Minister Kurti talked about the recent events in the country and the security situation, one month after the terrorist attack by Serbia on the Republic of Kosovo.

They also talked about the democratic reality in Kosovo and the successes of our country, where the topic of discussion was Kosovo’s application for membership in the Council of Europe.

They also talked about strengthening the cooperation between the sister parties of their two political subjects. Prime Minister Kurti congratulated Mr. Papandreou on the success achieved in the last local elections held in Greece this month.

Last modified: October 25, 2023
